vsParam:
Wow, you are really a man with good taste and vision!
It's great bargain now, you can have this on a special offer!

Uh? Is that Wilbell
opening a shop over there?

Hey~ Wilbell!
Is this your shop?

Ah, [px], and you guys.
How's my shop? Come check it out, special offers for you!

Magical medicines and magical items...
Wow, you have the whole lot.

But, why do you want to start up a business?
You don't strike me as financially struggling...

Er...
How should I put it... It's a sort of cultivation?

Uh, cultivation? Does opening a shop counted as
cultivation in your world, Wilbell!?

It has merits. It allows me to blend in the community.
Thanks to it, I am very good at doing business now.

Besides, witches in this world don't have to hide their
identities, right? It makes life way more easier!

But didn't you say that you don't
want to do menial jobs?
You are not forcing yourself, are you?

It... it's not like that! It just didn't go with my personality!
I'll still do it when I have to!

Ha-ha, that's no big deal.
I don't fool around when I need to be serious.

After all, I don't how long do I have to stay here,
it's good to having a bit of savings!

I am surprised... I didn't realize that Wilbell
is so thoughtful.

Why are you surprised!
Of course I'd think about it carefully!

Hehe, that's right. Selling homemade medicines is not easy,
planning is needed right from the search of material...

Material... Ah, right! Er, [px].
I have a favor to ask of you...

To be honest, I have used up all materials for making
the magical medicines. Can you help me collect some?
Ah, by the way, I'll buy from you with the wholesale price!

Ha-ha, a merchant indeed, and refuse to suffer any loss...
Never mind, we are helping Wilbell, let's go collect the
materials!

Wilbell!
We've collected all the materials you need!

Ah, thank you so much!
Now I can make products for tomorrow.

Is, is the business bad?
May I ask... how's your selling?

Er... My profit today can cover
my meal expenses for a week?
Are you still running the shop with so little earnings?

This is good enough already.
I literally couldn't sell anything when the business is bad.

Hmm. I'll be more motivated if I could make a bundle. And
I can focus more on wizardry cultivation when I am rich.
Hmm... Life is hard for everyone.

You are younger than me,
but you have been through so much sufferings...

W, Wilbell!
Just tell us if you need our help.

... You are going to help me? Thank you!
I'll look for your help when I have troubles!

Hehe. Isn't this great?
Children should be full of energy♪

Hey, hang on!?
Stop calling me a child, ok!
